info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 1:59PM EDT until July 21 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Northwestern New Haven County in southern Connecticut... Northern Westchester County in southeastern New York... Eastern Putnam County in southeastern New York... * Until 245 PM EDT. * At 158 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ridgefield, or near Danbury, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Redding around 210 PM EDT. Danbury and Bethel around 215 PM EDT. Newtown around 220 PM EDT. Southbury around 230 PM EDT. Middlebury around 240 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
